entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
